HCD #917 Delayed
HCD train #917, scheduled to arrive Joliet at 5:56 PM, is operating 30 to 35 minutes behind schedule due to earlier freight train interference.

The Museum Campus east elevator is back in service.

MED Van Buren Station Platform Elevator
The Van Buren Station Platform elevator is back in service.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED 79th, 87th, 103rd St. Station ADA Accessibility
Monday through Friday, from 9AM to 4PM, the 79th St., 87th St., and 103rd St. stations may not be fully ADA accessible due to nearby station construction.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/HC?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
HC - Chicago Union Station Service Disruption
Metra apologizes for tonight's overcrowding at Chicago Union Station and the delays caused by switch problems. Metra and Amtrak are reviewing this situation and apologize for this inconvenience.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/HC?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=1&gtfsrt=1
HCD #919 Delayed
HCD train #919 scheduled to arrive Joliet at 6:36 PM, may be operating 25 to 30 minutes behind schedule, due to  switch problems. Visit metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
The 95th St/Chicago State University station will close March 3, 2025 - Station Rehab and Expansion Project

On Monday, March 3, the 95th st/Chicago State University station will close for approximately 2 years to undergo a rehabilitation and expansion project. During this time passengers should use 91st street and 103rd st/Rosemoor stations as alternates. Updates will be provided.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF #1279 - Will Not Operate

BNSF train #1279, scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 6:10 PM, will not operate due to  switch problems. Train #1283, scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 6:50 PM will accommodate  passengers.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/RI?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Beginning May 9, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station Reconstruction

Beginning May 9, 2025, the 115th Street Morgan Park Station will be temporarily inaccessible to ADA users due to station reconstruction. Full site construction is expected to continue through Spring 2026. An accessible alternative is the 111th Street Morgan Park Station. Metra will provide updates once accessibility is restored.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF - Chicago Union Station Service Disruption
Metra apologizes for tonight's overcrowding at Chicago Union Station and the delays caused by switch problems. Metra and Amtrak are reviewing this situation and apologize for this inconvenience.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=0&Email=0&SMS=0&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
Michigan and Randolph Elevator Out of Service

The Michigan Avenue elevator located on the southwest corner of Michigan and Randolph is permanently out of service. Customers can use the South Water elevator, 225 N Michigan Avenue, or McCormick Place as an alternate boarding station.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF Inbound Trains on the Move
BNSF inbound trains are back on the move and may be operating with extensive delays due to switch problems. Visit Metratracker.com for the location of your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF train #1267 will not operate

BNSF train #1267 scheduled to depart Chicago Union Station at 5:20 pm, will not operate due to switch problems near Chicago Union Station. Train #1269 will be the next train to accommodate passengers to Aurora.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/SWS?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
SWS trains delayed

Due to a switch failure at Chicago Union Station, inbound and outbound trains may be delayed up to 20 minutes behind schedule, Some track changes may be necessary on the south concourse. Please check gate boards prior to boarding your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/SWS?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
SWS - Chicago Union Station Service Disruption
Metra apologizes for tonight's overcrowding at Chicago Union Station and the delays caused by switch problems. Metra and Amtrak are reviewing this situation and apologize for this inconvenience.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/BNSF?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
BNSF Outbound Trains Delayed

Due to a switch failure at Chicago Union Station, Outbound trains may be delayed up to 45 minutes behind schedule. Some track changes may be necessary on the south concourse. Please check gate boards prior to boarding your train.
https://metrarail.com/maps-schedules/train-lines/ME?Twitter=1&Email=1&SMS=1&Website=1&OnBoard=0&gtfsrt=1
MED 51st Street East Elevator Out of Service
The 51st Street East elevator is out of service. Customers can use McCormick Place or 55th/56th/57th Street as alternate boarding stations.
